form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Medical Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, NSN 7540-00-139-0058

full_text: FADUMO Screened by NARA, 5/12/2023 A 70 395 460 PLACE BRUCE HOUSE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION (Mo., Day, Yr.) October 25 1993 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at NAIROBI KENYA NAME (Last in CAPS) (First) (Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX (Mo., Day, Yr.) F M I certify that on the above date I examined ABDI FADUMO DHABAR 1908 WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON GENERAL PHYSICAL EXAMINATION I examined specifically for evidence of the conditions listed below. My examination revealed: No apparent defect, disease, or disability The conditions listed below were found (Check boxes that apply) CLASS A CONDITIONS (Give pertinent details under Remarks) CLASS B CONDITIONS Chancrold Hansen's Disease, Infectious Tuberculosis, Active Tuberculosis, Not Active Gonorrhea Lymphogranuloma Venereum Human Immunodeficiency Hansen's Disease, Not Infectious Granuloma ingulnale Syphilis, infectious Virus (HIV) Infection Other Physical Defect, Disease or Disability: Mental Retardation Previous Occurrence of One or Mental Defect CATARACT 2. HYPERTENSION Insanity More Attacks of Insanity Narcotic Drug Addiction Sexual Deviation Psychopathic Personality Chronic Alcoholism 3 PTERTGLUM EXAMINATION FOR TUBERCULOSIS TUBERCULIN SKIN TEST (See USPHS Instructions) CHEST X-RAY REPORT No reaction Normal Abnormal Not Done Describe findings: Reaction mm Not Done DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DATE READ DR. P. P. SHAH 25 OCT 93 SEROLOGIC TEST FOR SYPHILIS SEROLOGIC TEST FOR HIV ANTIBODY Reactive Titer (Confirmatory test performed - Indicate Positive (Confirmed by Western Blot or equally rellable test) treatment under Remarks) Nonreactive Negative Not Done Not Done TEST TYPE: VDRL TEST TYPE: HIV ANTIBODY SCREENING DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READ DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) DATE READY THE NAIROBI HOSPITAL 25 OCT 93 THE NAIROBI HOSPITAL 25 OCT 93 OTHER SPECIAL REPORT(S) (When needed) Urine routine: Protein - nil, Glucose - nil DR. C. S. SHETH Stool routine: E. histolytica & Trichuris trichiura DOCTOR'S NAME (Please print) REMARKS Scarring on epigastrium and both shoulders Stool - i) Cysts of E. histolytica. Prescribed Metronidazole ii) Ova of Trichuris trichiura. Prescribed Zentel CLASS B: 1. Bilateral Cataracts - advise opthalmic opinion 2. Hypertension. B.P. 220/100 to 220/106. Advise evaluation and treatment. 3. Bilateral Pterygium APPLICANT CERTIFICATION I certify that I understand the purpose of the medical examination and I authorize the required tests to be completed. The information on this form refers to me. LEFT THUMS. 25 OCT 1993 Signature Date DOCTOR'S NAME (Please type or print clearly) DOCTOR'S SIGNATURE DATE DR. C. S. SHETH Party 30 OCT 93 NSN 7540-00-139-0058 50157-103 OPTIONAL FORM 157 REVISED 2-88 U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE : 1992 o - 326-779 DEPT. OF STATE
